TextView.android:text:
\FaceReader is emotion recognition application that recognizes 7 basic human emotions: 

			- Anger, 
			- Disgust, 
			- Fear, 
			- Happiness, 
			- Sadness, 
			- Surprisement, 
			- Neutral.

	 It uses Convolution Neural Network model that was made by us using Python and it has about 66% accuracy judging by FER test set. 

	 All you have to do is load image from your phone's memory with your face or take a photo by your front/back camera!
